item.title: Don’t Tell Them What You Can Do, Show Them Mindset
item.dc:creator: John Roseli
item.description: The Don’t Tell Them What You Can Do, Show Them Mindset is the key to begin bringing ideas into the physical world. When we begin telling our self not to tell others what we are doing but rather show them, we begin forcing our self […]
item.content:encoded: The Don’t Tell Them What You Can Do, Show Them Mindset is the key to begin bringing ideas into the physical world. When we begin telling our self not to tell others what we are doing but rather show them, we begin forcing our self into action. Many people have great ideas but allow the satisfaction of talking about them to end the movement towards the idea. Bring ideas into the physical world and show them to others. If you do this, you will then be on your way to making your dreams become a reality.

item.title: The Host Mindset
item.dc:creator: John Roseli
item.description: The Host Mindset is a useful tool when entering an environment of strangers. The host mindset allows you to take focus off yourself and put it on others. This allows us to mingle freely, feel confident and own any room we walk into.
item.content:encoded: The Host Mindset is a useful tool when entering an environment of strangers. The host mindset allows you to take focus off yourself and put it on others. This allows us to mingle freely, feel confident and own any room we walk into.

item.title: This Too Shall Pass Mindset
item.dc:creator: John Roseli
item.description: The This Too Shall Pass Mindset is a useful mindset to help us through hard times and to appreciate the good times. During hard times this mindset reminds us that no matter what is going on in our life, eventually it will pass and get […]
item.content:encoded: The This Too Shall Pass Mindset is a useful mindset to help us through hard times and to appreciate the good times. During hard times this mindset reminds us that no matter what is going on in our life, eventually it will pass and get better. During good times, this mindset reminds us that eventually these good times will pass and that we must appreciate them while they are here.

item.title: Thought Frequencies
item.dc:creator: John Roseli
item.description: Thought Frequencies are a form of energy that our brain transmits. This energy is something that directly impacts our life and could impact the lives of others. Concentrated thought and focus on that thought will create any desired life.
item.content:encoded: Thought Frequencies are a form of energy that our brain transmits. This energy is something that directly impacts our life and could impact the lives of others. Concentrated thought and focus on that thought will create any desired life.

item.title: The Perseverance Mindset
item.dc:creator: John Roseli
item.description: The Perseverance Mindset is a key mindset to aid in our travels through life. Life is all about growth and destruction. In order for anything new to be created, destruction or struggle needs to take place. Perseverance is understanding that when problems present themselves, this […]
item.content:encoded: The Perseverance Mindset is a key mindset to aid in our travels through life. Life is all about growth and destruction. In order for anything new to be created, destruction or struggle needs to take place. Perseverance is understanding that when problems present themselves, this is an opportunity to become better and stronger.

item.title: Mindset
item.dc:creator: John Roseli
item.description: Mindset is the determining factor that will either make us a success or failure. Our mindset can either motivate us through struggle and succeed or force us to shut down and fail. Paying close attention to our mindset and deliberately directing it will allow us […]
item.content:encoded: Mindset is the determining factor that will either make us a success or failure. Our mindset can either motivate us through struggle and succeed or force us to shut down and fail. Paying close attention to our mindset and deliberately directing it will allow us to create the life of our dreams.
